statements: SELECT * FROM malware_activity_logs
SELECT log_id, timestamp, malware_type, action_taken FROM malware_activity_logs
SELECT malware_type, log_id, action_taken, timestamp FROM malware_activity_logs
SELECT log_id, action_taken FROM malware_activity_logs WHERE malware_type = 'Trojan'
SELECT * FROM malware_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT log_id, timestamp, malware_type, action_taken FROM malware_activity_logs WHERE malware_type = 'Trojan' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM malware_activity_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND action_taken LIKE 'Quarantine%'
SELECT log_id, malware_type, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM malware_activity_logs GROUP BY malware_type ORDER BY total_logs DESC
SELECT log_id, timestamp, malware_type, action_taken FROM malware_activity_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND action_taken = 'Removed'
SELECT DISTINCT malware_type FROM malware_activity_logs ORDER BY malware_type ASC
SELECT * FROM malware_activity;
SELECT activity_type, description FROM malware_activity;
SELECT id, description, detected_at FROM malware_activity WHERE activity_type = 'virus';
SELECT * FROM malware_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT log_message, logged_at FROM malware_logs WHERE activity_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM malware_activity WHERE activity_type = 'ransomware';
SELECT id, description FROM malware_activity ORDER BY detected_at DESC;
SELECT ma.activity_type, ml.log_message FROM malware_activity ma INNER JOIN malware_logs ml ON ma.id = ml.activity_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM malware_activity;
SELECT * FROM malware_logs WHERE logged_at >= '2022-01-01' AND logged_at <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MalwareLogs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, malware_name FROM MalwareLogs WHERE malware_name = 'Ransomware';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action_taken FROM MalwareLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT detection_id, detection_timestamp, detected_malware, detection_details FROM MalwareDetection WHERE detection_id > 10;
SELECT stat_id, malware_name, detection_count FROM MalwareStatistics WHERE detection_count >= 5 ORDER BY detection_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM MalwareLogs WHERE malware_name='WannaCry';
SELECT detection_id, detection_timestamp, detected_malware FROM MalwareDetection ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT stat_id, malware_name, detection_count FROM MalwareStatistics WHERE detection_count > 10 ORDER BY detection_count DESC;
SELECT log_id, malware_name, action_taken FROM MalwareLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action_taken FROM MalwareLogs WHERE malware_name LIKE 'Meltdown%' OR malware_name LIKE 'Spectre%';
SELECT * FROM malware_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC, activity_type;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM malware_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Phishing';
SELECT log_type, log_details FROM malware_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, operating_system, last_login FROM malware_devices WHERE last_login > '2022-02-01';
SELECT analysis_id, sample_id, analyst_name FROM malware_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT activity_type, source_ip FROM malware_activity WHERE destination_ip='192.168.1.1';
SELECT device_name, operating_system, last_login FROM malware_devices WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result, analyst_name FROM malware_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_type FROM malware_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM malware_hosts;
SELECT host_name, ip_address, malware_type FROM malware_hosts WHERE last_scan_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT host_name, malware_type FROM malware_hosts ORDER BY host_name ASC;
SELECT ip_address, last_scan_date FROM malware_hosts WHERE malware_type IS NULL;
SELECT host_name, ip_address FROM malware_hosts WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT * FROM malware_hosts WHERE malware_type = 'Ransomware';
SELECT host_name, ip_address FROM malware_hosts WHERE last_scan_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY host_name ASC;
SELECT m.host_name, m.ip_address, a.attack_type FROM malware_hosts m JOIN malware_attacks a ON m.id = a.host_id WHERE a.attack_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT h.host_name, l.log_time, l.log_message FROM malware_hosts h JOIN malware_logs l ON h.id = l.host_id ORDER BY l.log_time DESC;

SELECT r.report_date, a.attack_type, a.attack_details, h.host_name FROM malware_report r JOIN malware_analysis a ON r.analysis_id = a.analysis_id JOIN malware_hosts h ON a.host_id = h.id WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
